org.bonitasoft.engine.api

Interface ProfileAPI

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ProfileAPI

    public interface ProfileAPI
    Profiles are a notion used in BonitaBPM Portal to give and control access to some specific features of the Bonita BPM suite. Profiles are associated to Bonita Identity / Organization notions: users, groups, roles, memberships. ProfileAPI gives access to some of the profile administration: adding / removing members to / from a profile, retrieving / searching for profiles.
    Full control on profiles is part of Subscription editions of Bonita BPM suite.
    Author:
    Celine Souchet, Matthieu Chaffotte
    See Also:
    SearchResult for general knowledege on Search mechanism in Bonita BPM.

    • Method Detail

      • getProfile

        Profile getProfile(long id)
                   throws ProfileNotFoundException
        Retrieves the profile.
        Parameters:
        id - The identifier of the profile
        Returns:
        the searched profile
        Throws:
        ProfileNotFoundException - If the identifier does not refer to an existing profile
        RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the profile retrieving
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • getProfilesForUser

        @Deprecated
List<Profile> getProfilesForUser(long userId)
                                 throws UserNotFoundException
        Deprecated. since 6.3
        Retrieves the profiles of the user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The identifier of the user
        Returns:
        The 1000 first profiles of the user, ordered by name
        Throws:
        UserNotFoundException - If the user identifier does not refer to an existing user
        RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the profile retrieving
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0
        See Also:
        getProfilesForUser(long, int, int, ProfileCriterion)

      • getProfilesForUser

        List<Profile> getProfilesForUser(long userId,
                               int startIndex,
                               int maxResults,
                               ProfileCriterion criterion)
        Retrieves the profiles of the user.
        Parameters:
        userId - The identifier of the user
        startIndex - The index of the first result (starting from 0).
        maxResults - The maximum number of elements to get per page.
        criterion - The criterion for sorting the items over pages.
        Returns:
        The paginated and ordered profiles of the user
        Throws:
        RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the profile retrieving
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.3.2

        6.0

      • getNumberOfProfileMembers

        Map<Long,Long> getNumberOfProfileMembers(List<Long> profileIds)
        Retrieves the number of profile members for the profiles. The map contains the couples profileId/numberOfProfileMembers.

        If a profile does not exists, no exception is thrown and no value is added in the map.

        Parameters:
        profileIds - The identifiers of the profiles
        Returns:
        the number of profile members for the profiles
        Throws:
        RetrieveException - If an exception occurs during the profile retrieving
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • searchProfileMembers

        SearchResult<ProfileMember> searchProfileMembers(String memberType,
                                               SearchOptions options)
                                                 throws SearchException
        Searches profile members according to the criteria containing in the options.
        Parameters:
        memberType - The member type, it can be: user, role, group, roleAndGroup.
        options - The search criteria
        Returns:
        the search result
        Throws:
        SearchException - If an exception occurs during the profile searching
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • createProfileMember

        ProfileMember createProfileMember(Long profileId,
                                Long userId,
                                Long groupId,
                                Long roleId)
                                  throws CreationException,
                                         AlreadyExistsException
        Creates a profile member.
        Parameters:
        profileId - The identifier of the profile
        userId - The identifier of the user
        groupId - The identifier of the group
        roleId - The identifier of the role
        Returns:
        the created profile member
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - If the tuple profileId/userId/roleId/groupId is already taken by an existing profile member
        CreationException - If an exception occurs during the profile member creation
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

      • createProfileMember

        ProfileMember createProfileMember(ProfileMemberCreator creator)
                                  throws CreationException,
                                         AlreadyExistsException
        Creates a profile member.

        It takes the values of the creator in order to create the profile member.

        Parameters:
        creator - The profile member to create
        Returns:
        the created profile member
        Throws:
        AlreadyExistsException - If the tuple profileId/userId/roleId/groupId is already taken by an existing profile member
        CreationException - If an exception occurs during the profile member creation
        InvalidSessionException - If the session is invalid (expired, unknown, ...)
        Since:
        6.0

        Throws:
